feed.title: Axel Lundberg - Curated Posts
feed.subtitle: A curated collection of interesting blog posts and articles

entry.title: The Math Behind GANs
entry.content: In this post, we’ll take a deep dive into the math behind GANs. My primary source of reference is Generative Adversarial Nets by Ian Goodfellow, et al. It is in this paper that Goodfellow first outlined the concept of a GAN, which is why it only makes sense that we commence from the analysis of this paper. Let’s begin!
